name: Roots (The Gecko, HummusMakesBread)
description:
Welcome to Roots! Your favourite clothing store, except- something seems off this time...  The roots monster has come to life and the only way you can escape its wrath is with the 3 gems of roots located around the deserted store.

Game jam submission by Hadi J., HummusMakesBread, and The Gecko! It was a lot of fun to make :D

Too sleep-deprived right now to make a proper description of our game, but will write one soon!

Music credits also coming soon (none of the music or sound was made by us)

Source code: https://github.com/TheRealGecko/Roots
